content.raw:

Qt has caught an exception thrown from an event handler. Throwing

reimplement QApplication::notify() and catch all exceptions there.

content.raw:
Way to reproduce:

1. Insert a model, right-click, apply force/torque

1. Cancel the dialog

1. Right-click again on the same mode, apply force/torque -> crash
content.html:
Way to reproduce:

  1. Insert a model, right-click, apply force/torque

  2. Cancel the dialog

  3. Right-click again on the same mode, apply force/torque -> crash

content.raw: This was an issue on branch `apply_force_dialog` and it was solved by commit 38d316b
content.html: This was an issue on branch apply_force_dialog and it was solved by commit 38d316b
